dawn.com/2015/05/pakistan-win-opening-ha.snippet: LAHORE: Pakistan won their inaugural match at the fifth Asian Beach Handball Championship beating Iran 2-0 in Muscat. Pakistan won the first half 16-14 and second 15-12. They will play their second league match against defending champions Qatar.
